name: Pandemic Boat
description:
Pandemic Boat is a fixed/bi-directional shooter in wich the player controls a boat that have to move around an island infected by enemies. Made with a limited 140x192 resolution and a 6 color palette, it is a tribute to the early 80's games and the Apple II. Bullet Hell Jam 2022

-Use left/right arrows or S/F keys to direct the boat around the edge.

-Press up arrow or E key to double the boat speed.

Score by killing enemies and avoiding bullets. 

Boss: 250 pts

Robot: 99 pts

Laser: 50 pts

Turret: 50 pts

Mine: 25 pts

Avoid Bullet: 100 pts

Have fun !
